title: War of the Roses: The Kid Ratted Him Out
description: Amanda is engaged to David but he spends a lot of time with his best friend that's a girl and their daughter told her something about David and his "best friend" hanging out that sounded like something more than just hanging out was happening.  Is David cheating on her with his best friend?
